about_the_game:
All images and videos currently available are still from the old Prelude/Interlude Version! The updated graphics of the Reborn Version will be revealed very soon 💖.


Craft your ultimate deck from a collection of over 270 unique ability cards, including devastating attacks, powerful magic, strategic buffs, cunning debuffs, and loyal summons. Engage in intense real-time battles, where your skill and strategy will determine your victory against formidable enemies.


Venture into the world of Requia, where you'll strive to conquer the ancient planet Aurelis and embark on countless quests in pursuit of fame and glory. Define your role as a fighter, paladin, magician, or any other class, limited only by your equipment cards and your deck. Forge your unique path in the game and carve out your own destiny.


Race against time and rivals to defeat rare monsters and uncover ancient chests. Gather diverse resources both online and offline to craft valuable equipment and item cards, enhancing your arsenal and gameplay experience."


Master the art of crafting by creating your own equipment and item cards across six distinct crafting classes.


Put your skills to the test by challenging friends in thrilling PvP duels, or join forces to battle mighty creatures together. Enter the arena and compete for glory and honor in the league.


Amass wealth and become the renowned merchant of Aurelis. Utilize the secure auction house to trade valuable equipment, item, and resource cards with confidence and ease.


Got duplicate cards? Merge them through enchanting to elevate their power. Need more copies? Craft your own and boost their abilities via enchanting, optimizing your strategy and gameplay.


Keep track of your diverse card collection, including ability, item, equipment, monster, resource, and recipe cards, by managing them in your knowledge base. Gaining more knowledge about monsters grants you additional advantages in battle, enhancing your strategic prowess.


Rise to the challenge and compete against other players in weekly events. Earn valuable rewards, fueling your journey to greatness.


Be rewarded for your valiant efforts with the comprehensive achievement system that recognizes accomplishments across all categories. Earn not only prestigious badges, but also ability cards and card packs to enhance your collection and prowess.



If you want to know more feel free to join our ever growing Community in Discord!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“This game is simply incredible. A TCG with RPG elements has been done before, even by well-known developers, but Requia has done it the best. No pay2win and full control in the game make it easy to get addicted. Crafting farming endless grind as RPG players love it. Tutorials take place piece by piece as a story. No overstimulation by too much babbling and clicking!!! 5 stars and cheers to the developers of this masterpiece.”
Marcel Gräfe

“Finally, no more one-size-fits-all!!! There are a lot of cool ideas in this game. Especially the innovative battle system is fun. You can tell that the game is about the game and the players and not about making money. You have to play the game to get ahead and can't just "buy your way through". It's a very special kind of game and definitely worth a visit.”
Chicola Vicosoft
short_description: 🌟 Immerse yourself in a unique TCG/RPG/MMO adventure that blends collectible card and role-playing elements, defying traditional turn-based card game norms to deliver a very distinctive single and multiplayer experience for the first time on iOS, Android, and Steam. Made with 💖 in Austria.
